snacks.name: Jailhouse Accomodation
snacks.description: Set in a refurbished 1874 building Jailhouse Accommodation offers an on-site café and a guest lounge with a cinema projector. It is 10 minutes’ walk from Christchurch Railway Station. Guests enjoy free parking and free WiFi in public areas. Formerly Addington Prison, this property offers Gothic-style architecture and a historical display room. All accommodation offers access to shared bathroom facilities. Bed linen is provided in all rooms.

snacks.name: Urbanz
snacks.description: Renovated in 2015, Urbanz offers accommodation in downtown Christchurch. The building features a range of rooms with either shared or private bathrooms. Free parking is located nearby ad free WiFi is provided throughout. Guests can play a game of pool or watch a show on the satellite TV while enjoying a drink at the on-site bar. There is a self-catering kitchen and there are guest laundry facilities available. Towels are available for hire.

snacks.name: The Old Country House
snacks.description: Are you yearning for a comfortable bed and a place that makes you feel at home? The Old Countryhouse is an award winning hostel that has had comfort and coziness sorted for over 20 years! Our colonial style villas are well heated, have excellent kitchen facilities, lounges to chill out and watch a movie and much much more!!

snacks.name: Foley Towers
snacks.description: First try Foley Towers! Fabulously friendly. Finest facilities. Free un-limited Wifi and fantastic value for independent travellers. Gorgeous gardens. Underfloor heating, lashings of hot water, loads of space. Firm beds, feather duvets. Free off-street parking and free luggage storage. NO Bunks except in dorms. Super Smiling Staff. No loud parties, no backpacker bus crowds or hard sell. Check in after 9pm by arrangement. Extend your stay before 10am if you're too relaxed to move on. To meet people in a beautiful, quiet, laid back, clean, extremely comfortable and super friendly space then this is the place for you. Foley Towers has two kitchens, two lounge/dining rooms, two washer/driers and two gorgeous gardens full of trees and flowers. Space to mingle, room to rest.

snacks.name: YMCA
snacks.description: YMCA Hostel offers budget accommodations in the heart of Auckland CBD (Central Business District). Guests have access to a shared kitchenette, an outdoor seating area and lounge room with billiards and cable TV. The bars and clubs of Karangahape Road are a 2-minute walk from YMCA Hostel Auckland. It is 5 minutes’ walk to the city’s best shopping on Queen Street. All rooms include a small refrigerator, a heater and bed linen. There is also a wardrobe and work desk in each room. YMCA Hostel offers separate female and mixed dorm rooms.

snacks.name: The Attic
snacks.description: he Attic Bar & Restaurant in Mission Bay opened it’s red door to the public on the 26th June 2009. Previously the site had been a multitude of different themed restaurants but none truly suited the area or the local clientele. At last Mission Bay has an up market, quality Bar and Restaurant where locals, tourists and the many Aucklanders who come to Mission Bay can go for a drink and meal with service and food that is not generally found outside the central city.

snacks.name: Haka Lodge
snacks.description: Haka Lodge is the brainchild of Ryan Sanders, owner and operator of Haka Tours. Haka Lodge’s vision is simple; to provide an upmarket backpackers lodge, all the while costing no more than a normal hostel. To do this, we have installed modern facilities in all of our hostels and keep them to a very high standard. Our Paihia and Auckland lodges are brand-new and feature modern kitchens, living spaces and more. Our Queenstown and Christchurch lodges have a full-sized kitchen, modern bathrooms and plenty of living space. Each of our hostels is close to the CBD and within easy access to public transport. Plus, each of our hostels features great bonuses like unlimited free WiFi.

snacks.name: Queenstreet Backpackers
snacks.description: Queen Street Backpackers is located in a historic building in Auckland CBD (Central Business District) and offers free WiFi in the rooms and throughout the property. Guests can enjoy a free breakfast, which includes a selection of cereals, toast, spreads, tea, coffee and orange juice. The property features shared kitchen facilities and a large communal lounge area with a bar, billiards table, a TV, and gaming devices. Accommodation options include private rooms and dormitories. All bed linen is provided.

snacks.name: The Marion
snacks.description: Located in the heart of the city of Wellington,The Marion Hostel offers a range of backpacker accommodation and features a rooftop terrace. It is just a 1-minute walk from Cuba Street where you will find a variety of restaurants, cafes and bars. Free high speed unlimited WiFi is offered throughout the property.

snacks.name: Trek Global
snacks.description: Trek Global features 4 communal guest kitchens and a barbecue area. It is a 10-minute walk from Wellington’s CBD and Wellington Waterfront. Free unlimited WiFi is provided. Guest rooms offer simple interiors and are fully heated. Toilet and bathroom facilities are shared. The property offers mountain bike rentals for guests to explore the area. A self-service laundry service is available.

snacks.name: YHA
snacks.description: Featuring 2 guest lounges and a communal kitchen, YHA Christchurch is located opposite the Arts Centre, just 150 m from the Botanic Gardens and Hagley Park. You can enjoy a meal and relax in the lovely BBQ and garden area. There is a guest laundry on site. The guestrooms are clean and comfortable. Some rooms feature private bathroom facilities, others offer access to a shared bathroom.

snacks.name: The Dwellington
snacks.description: Offering a tennis court, The Dwellington is less than 5 minutes’ drive from the Bluebridge Ferry Terminal and 10 minutes' drive from the Interislander Ferry Terminal. Guests can enjoy free ferry drop offs in the morning and free WiFi in public areas. The Dwellington is a 10-minute walk from Wellington Train and Bus Station and a variety of restaurants, cafes and shops. It is a 15-minute walk from Westpac Stadium and Lambton Quay. There is access to a shared kitchen and a dining area. The bathroom facilities are shared and include a shower and a toilet. There is also a movie room with a TV. Free breakfast is served from 7:30 until 10:00 daily and includes coffee, tea, milk, toast, cereal and a selection of spreads.

snacks.name: Addington Stadium Motel
snacks.description: Addington Stadium Motel offers accommodation in Christchurch. Free private parking is available on site. Every room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free Netflix streaming is offered. Each room includes a private bathroom. Addington Stadium Motel features free WiFi throughout the property. Horncastle Arena (CBS Canterbury Arena) is 500 m from Addington Stadium Motel, while AMI Stadium is 800 m away. The nearest airport is Christchurch Airport, 8 km from Addington Stadium Motel. The motel also provides free transfer service to and from Christchurch Railway station.

snacks.name: Academy Motor Lodge
snacks.description: Located opposite the University of Canterbury, Academy Motor Lodge offers a free parking and accommodation with a satellite TV. Academy Motel is a 10-minute drive from Christchurch Airport and Hagley Golf Course. It is 15 minutes’ drive from the Christchurch city centre. There is a self-service laundry provided. Wireless internet access is available throughout the property. Each accommodation is heated and offers a fridge, microwave and tea and coffee making facilities. Academy Motor Lodge provides a free shuttle bus to and from the Christchurch Casino.

snacks.name: 319 Addington
snacks.description: Situated in the Addington district in Christchurch, 319 Addington Motel features free WiFi access and free private parking. Opened in April 2016, the motel is just 1.4 km from AMI Stadium and 1.8 km from Christchurch Public and Women's Hospital. The property also offers a free transfer service to and from Christchurch Railway Station. Each air-conditioned room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is offered. Re:START is 1.8 km from 319 Addington Motel, while Canterbury Museum is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 9 km from 319 Addington Motel.

snacks.name: 2 on Whiteleigh
snacks.description: Featuring free WiFi, 2 on Whiteleigh Motel is located in Christchurch, 400 m from AMI Stadium. Free private parking is available on site. A flat-screen TV with cable channels and an iPod docking station is provided. Some rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or patio are featured in certain rooms. Hagley Park is 2.1 km from 2 on Whiteleigh Motel, while Canterbury Museum is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Christchurch International Airport, 8 km from 2 on Whiteleigh Motel. Addington is a great choice for travellers interested in family friendly trips, sightseeing and city walks.

snacks.name: Abaco on Jervois
snacks.description: Just 7 minutes’ drive from Auckland city centre, Abaco on Jervois offers accommodation with free WiFi and satellite TV. There is a range of shops, cafés and restaurants within 3 minutes’ walk. Guests receive free on-site parking. All accommodation features a kitchen or kitchenette with a refrigerator and tea/coffee making facilities. Some offer a spa bath or balcony with sea views. Victoria Park and the Viaduct Harbour are each within 5 minutes’ drive of the Abaco Motel. The Sky Tower is 8 minutes’ drive and St Lukes’ Westfield Shopping Centre is 13 minutes’ drive away.

snacks.name: Pupuke Manor
snacks.description: Renovated in August 2018, Pupuke Manor Motel offers free WiFi and rooms with air conditioning in Auckland. Ideally located in the Takapuna district, this motel provides a terrace. Auckland Harbour Bridge is 5 km from the motel and Viaduct Harbour is 6 km away. All guest rooms at the motel come with a seating area. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms have a kitchen fitted with a microwave. Guest rooms have a desk.

snacks.name: Siesta
snacks.description: Just 10 minutes’ drive from central Auckland, Siesta Motel offers rooms with a private balcony, free WiFi and satellite/cable TV. It features a barbecue area set in lovely gardens, and free on-site parking. Siesta Motel is just 10 minutes’ drive from Viaduct Harbor and Skycity Casino, and 10 minutes’ walk from Newmarket Train Station. Auckland Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

snacks.name: Greenlane Suites
snacks.description: Situated in Greenlane, just 6 km from Auckland city, Greenlane Suites features barbecue facilities, laundry facilities and an on-site restaurant. This 4-star plus property offers contemporary accommodation with unlimited free WiFi and is conveniently located nearby some of Auckland's main attractions. Ellerslie Racecourse is 1 km from the property, while the ASB Showgrounds are 1.5 km away.

snacks.name: Capital View Motor Inn
snacks.description: Just 5 minutes' walk from Cuba Street's bars and restaurants, Capital View Motor Inn offers self-contained apartments with views of the harbor and Wellington city. Guests enjoy free onsite parking and unlimited free WiFi. All accommodation offers a kitchen with a microwave, a hotplate and a refrigerator. Each apartment is equipped with heating, electric blankets and flat-screen satellite TV.

snacks.name: Apollo Lodge
snacks.description: Situated in the heart of Wellington’s entertainment precinct, Apollo Lodge Motel offers free WiFi and free off-street parking, subject to availability. Each room includes heating and satellite TV. All rooms at Apollo Lodge Motel Wellington feature ironing facilities and a private bathroom. Tea/coffee making facilities, plus a microwave, refrigerator and toaster are provided.

snacks.name: Marksman Motor Inn
snacks.description: Just 3 minutes’ walk from Government House Wellington, Marksman Motor Inn offers accommodation with flat-screen satellite TV and a microwave. The property features Wi-Fi internet access and free parking. Marksman Inn is located in the heart of Wellington, 10 minutes’ walk from the Courtenay Place entertainment district. Wellington International Airport is a 10-minute drive away. All units are heated, and include a refrigerator, toaster and tea and coffee making facilities. Each unit has a spacious seating area and a private bathroom with guest toiletries.

snacks.name: Airport Motel
snacks.description: just 5 minutes’ drive from Wellington Airport and overlooking beautiful Lyall Bay. Most rooms feature a private balcony or spa bath. All heated rooms feature a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each room has satellite TV and a private en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and guest toiletries. Wellington Airport Motel is located opposite a shopping centre, 15 minutes’ drive from Wellington’s city centre. The famous Te Papa Tongarewa Museum is a 20-minute drive away. The motel is 4 minutes drive from the ASB Sports Centre and Wellington Regional Aquatic Centre.

snacks.name: The George
snacks.description: The George Hotel is a 16th-century coaching inn situated in the centre of the historic market town of Wallingford. With seasonal bistro dining, it is also 20 minutes’ drive from Oxford. Private en suite bathrooms are provided in all rooms at The George, along with TVs with Sky and free Wi-Fi. Hairdryers, tea/coffee-making facilities and laundry/dry cleaning services are also available to guests. Guests can enjoy a seasonal, à la carte menu with traditional English dishes at Wealh’s Restaurant. The Bistro offers lighter dining within more relaxed surroundings. The Tavern Bar provides guests with drinks and real ales alongside traditional pub meals which can be enjoyed in the hotel’s courtyard.

snacks.name: Sumner Re Treat
snacks.description: Situated 2 minutes’ walk from Sumner Beach, this boutique hotel offers apartments with a private balcony and free internet access. The Sumner Re Treat Luxury Apartments have been renovated and include full cooking facilities, air conditioning and stylish bathrooms with under-floor heating. Guests can enjoy a barbecue, or soak in the spa or swimming pool on the third level's outdoor deck. There is also a sun deck available on the 4th level. Free secure underground car parking and free luggage storage are also available.

snacks.name: Sudima Airport
snacks.description: Located just a 5-minute walk from Christchurch International Airport, the 4.5 star Sudima Hotel Christchurch Airport offers well-appointed hotel with 1GB of WiFi for 24 hours. It features complimentary guest parking and a 24- hour front desk. Each air-conditioned room at Sudima Hotel Christchurch Airport includes an LCD TV with satellite channels, a mini-bar, tea and coffee-making facilities and 24-hour room service.

snacks.name: Rydges Latimer
snacks.description: Situated 2 minutes’ walk from Sumner Beach, this boutique hotel offers apartments with a private balcony and free internet access. The Sumner Re Treat Luxury Apartments have been renovated and include full cooking facilities, air conditioning and stylish bathrooms with under-floor heating. Guests can enjoy a barbecue, or soak in the spa or swimming pool on the third level's outdoor deck. There is also a sun deck available on the 4th level. Free secure underground car parking and free luggage storage are also available. Sumner Re Treat is a 5-minute walk from Sumner village and a 20-minute drive from Christchurch city centre.

snacks.name: Jet Park Airport Hotel
snacks.description: Just a 5-minute drive from Auckland Airport, Jet Park Airport Hotel features a restaurant, lounge bar and swimming pool. Guests enjoy free WiFi in the comfort of their room, as well as in public areas such as the lobby and bar. A free 24-hour return airport shuttle bus is provided. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and a minibar. Each bathroom includes a hairdryer and guest toiletries. Te Maroro Restaurant offers local and international cuisine. In-room dining is available 24/7. The lounge bar overlooks the pool and offers cocktails and wines. Light meals are available from the all-day menu. Jet Park Airport Hotel is only a 10-minute drive from Manukau Harbour. Auckland’s city centre and Auckland Zoo are each a 25-minute drive away. Free valet parking is available.

snacks.name: Grand Millennium
snacks.description: Grand Millennium Auckland, superbly located in the city centre with some of the city’s finest dining, shopping and entertainment venues at your doorstep. All of the 452 stylish rooms and suites combine smart design, chic decor, floor to ceiling windows for natural light and modern amenities to ensure your comfort. Take advantage of quality facilities during your stay, whether it’s enjoying a swim in the heated indoor pool, a workout in the gym, relaxing at the Atrium Bar, appreciating the delights of the Grand Millennium Brasserie, or savouring a delicious teppanyaki meal at Katsura Japanese Restaurant.

snacks.name: Waldorf St Martins
snacks.description: Located in Auckland CBD (Central Business District), Waldorf St Martins Apartments Hotel offers luxurious apartments featuring a balcony. Upper Queen Street, Auckland Hospital and Universities are within 10 minutes’ walk. Guests receive 1GB of free WiFi per day. Each spacious apartment has an open plan living/dining area with a fully equipped kitchen. Superior apartments offer air-conditioning and stunning views. All apartments are serviced once a week. Guest facilities at Waldorf St Martins include a fitness centre and a shared laundry with washing machine and dryer. The hotel reception is open 24 hours a day and the Paua Room serves light breakfasts daily.

snacks.name: VR Auckland City
snacks.description: Facing the city skyline and the harbour, Auckland City Oaks offers apartment-style accommodation featuring 1GB of free WiFi per stay and a fully equipped kitchen. It is located in the heart of Auckland CBD (Central Business District). Each air conditioned apartment offers scenic views of the city and features laundry facilities and double-glazed windows. Limited pre-booked secure parking is available on site. A continental breakfast pack is provided in each apartment, including a cold sandwich, fresh fruit, juice and a muesli bar.

snacks.name: The Thorndon
snacks.description: Located in Wellington's city centre, within 5 minutes' walk from Lambton Quay shopping area, The Thrndon Hotel Wellington by Rydges features a restaurant and free access to a fitness centre and sauna. Guest also enjoy free WiFi. Wellington Railway Station is a 12-minute walk from the property. Glasshouse Restaurant & Bar offers modern New Zealand cuisine with beautiful garden views. The bar features a 50-inch flat-screen TV and a range of local wines. Rooms at The Thorndon Hotel Wellington are bright and comfortable, and some have views of the harbour or city skyline.

snacks.name: Willis
snacks.description: Located in the Cuba Quarter of Wellington, Willis Wellington Hotel is 6 minutes' walk from Renouf Tennis Centre. Each room features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Free WiFi is available in public areas and all rooms. Willis Wellington Hotel is just 6 minutes' walk from Aro Valley, for mountain biking and just 5 minutes' walk from Wellington's well-known café and boutique precinct. The waterfront is a 20-minute walk away. It is 10 minutes' drive from Wellington International Airport.

snacks.name: Trinity
snacks.description: Located in the heart of Wellington, Trinity Hotel offers rooms with satellite TV. Guests have access to a well-equipped fitness centre, a restaurant and a bar. Guests enjoy unlimited free WiFi. Trinity Hotel Wellington is only 5 minutes’ walk from Lambton Quay, famous for its cafés and boutique shopping. The Wellington Harbourfront and Te Papa Tongarewa Museum are 10 minutes' walk away. The Arborist rooftop bar and eatery is open most days from midday, weather permitting. It offers a selection of grilled meats and specialty salads. You can even cook it yourself at the tabletop BBQs, or dine at the downstairs restaurant.

snacks.name: Park Hotel Lambton Quay
snacks.description: Park Hotel Lambton Quay is situated in the heart of Wellington, just 200 m from the Cable Car. It features a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. You can unwind after a busy day exploring the city with a drink at the on-site bar. Private parking is available on site at an additional charge. These modern rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There is a toaster and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms also include full kitchen facilities. All rooms come with a private bathroom. Free toiletries, a hairdryer, and towels and linen are provided. Guests also get complimentary access to Les Mills gym. Park H

snacks.name: Jailhouse Accomodation
snacks.description: Set in a refurbished 1874 building Jailhouse Accommodation offers an on-site café and a guest lounge with a cinema projector. It is 10 minutes’ walk from Christchurch Railway Station. Guests enjoy free parking and free WiFi in public areas. Formerly Addington Prison, this property offers Gothic-style architecture and a historical display room. All accommodation offers access to shared bathroom facilities. Bed linen is provided in all rooms.

snacks.name: Urbanz
snacks.description: Renovated in 2015, Urbanz offers accommodation in downtown Christchurch. The building features a range of rooms with either shared or private bathrooms. Free parking is located nearby ad free WiFi is provided throughout. Guests can play a game of pool or watch a show on the satellite TV while enjoying a drink at the on-site bar. There is a self-catering kitchen and there are guest laundry facilities available. Towels are available for hire.

snacks.name: The Old Country House
snacks.description: Are you yearning for a comfortable bed and a place that makes you feel at home? The Old Countryhouse is an award winning hostel that has had comfort and coziness sorted for over 20 years! Our colonial style villas are well heated, have excellent kitchen facilities, lounges to chill out and watch a movie and much much more!!

snacks.name: Foley Towers
snacks.description: First try Foley Towers! Fabulously friendly. Finest facilities. Free un-limited Wifi and fantastic value for independent travellers. Gorgeous gardens. Underfloor heating, lashings of hot water, loads of space. Firm beds, feather duvets. Free off-street parking and free luggage storage. NO Bunks except in dorms. Super Smiling Staff. No loud parties, no backpacker bus crowds or hard sell. Check in after 9pm by arrangement. Extend your stay before 10am if you're too relaxed to move on. To meet people in a beautiful, quiet, laid back, clean, extremely comfortable and super friendly space then this is the place for you. Foley Towers has two kitchens, two lounge/dining rooms, two washer/driers and two gorgeous gardens full of trees and flowers. Space to mingle, room to rest.
